Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to suspending evictions of rent regulated tenants in certain situations due to COVID-19
Summary: Suspends evictions of rent regulated tenants when a tenant is forced to spend time away from their residence due to COVID-19 and cannot meet occupancy requirements of one hundred eighty-three days or more.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to suspending evictions for tenants who are forced to spend time away from their rent regulated residences and cannot meet certain occupancy requirements
